overview: WAIT FOR IT is a loving deconstruction of the slasher genre, seen from the perspective of a Survivor Girl living in the aftermath of her own encounter with a psycho-slasher killer. She travels home after a night out with friends, always remaining wary of the inevitable return of her tormentor. By the original creator and taking place in the world of Behind The Mask: The Rise of Leslie Vernon.
title: Wait For It
